name: com.unity.xr.hands
description: Surfaces the cross-platform subsystem API for hand-tracking. Implementations of providers will be found in the package for that platform.

samples.description: Sample showing how to detect and debug hand gestures.
Basic sample showing how to visualize hands.
Sample for recording real-time hand data to create custom gestures.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- Fixed compiler issue with Editor analytics when using some platforms.
- Fixed the XRHandShape Editor UI not updating the Hand Shape correctly in Play Mode using Link.
- Fixed XRFingerShapeCondition throwing an error when using `XRFingerShapeType.Unspecified`.
- Fixed XR Hand Capture issue where recording imports failed due to non-empty error stream.
